player

Class Merchant

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Player
      • player.ReactiveAIPlayer
        • player.MemoryAIPlayer
          • player.Merchant

  • public class Merchant
extends MemoryAIPlayer
    This AI is one that only sells cards. Its goal is to sell the highest valued cards so that other players will pay and it does not buy other cards so it will not make any money at the end of the season.
    Author:
    William Elliman

      • getBid

        public int getBid(int highestBid,
                  int maxVal)
        Description copied from class: ReactiveAIPlayer
        This is here for simplicity. It takes the highest value and the highest bid and determines what to bid. It also takes into account what kind of auction it is.
        Parameters:
        highestBid - the highest bid another player has made.
        maxVal - the highest this AI is willing to pay.
        Returns:
        The price this AI will bid on the painting.
